#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	while(1)
	{
	long long int a,b,i1=0,i2=1,i3=2,f;
	scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
	if(a==0&&b==0)
		break;
	else
		{
			while(1)
			{
			
			f=i2+i3;
			i2=i3;
			i3=f;
			if(f>=a&&f<=b)
				i1++;
			else if( i3>b)
			break;
				
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",i1);
	}
	return 0;
}
